total_revenue.context: Net sales increased 13% to $180.2 billion in the third quarter, compared with $158.9 billion in third quarter 2024.
total_revenue.fx_impact: Foreign exchange had a $1.5 billion favorable impact.

net_sales.context: North America segment sales increased 11% year-over-year to $106.3 billion.

operating_income.context: Includes $2.5B FTC settlement charge. Excluding this, operating income would have been $7.3 billion (6.9% margin).

net_sales.context: International segment sales increased 14% year-over-year to $40.9 billion.
AWS segment sales increased 20% year-over-year to $33.0 billion.

operating_income.context: AWS segment operating income was $11.4 billion, compared with $10.4 billion in third quarter 2024.
Includes $4.3B in special charges ($2.5B FTC settlement, $1.8B severance). Without these, operating income would have been $21.7 billion.

net_income.context: Net income increased to $21.2 billion. Includes $9.5B pre-tax gain from Anthropic investment.

eps.context: $1.95 per diluted share, compared with $1.43 per diluted share in third quarter 2024.

operating_cash_flow.context: Operating cash flow increased 16% to $130.7 billion for the trailing twelve months.

free_cash_flow.context: Free cash flow decreased to $14.8 billion for the trailing twelve months, driven by increased CapEx.

capital_expenditures.context: Cash CapEx was $34.2 billion in Q3. Purchases of property and equipment were $35.1 billion per cash flow statement. Full year 2025 expected approx $125 billion.

aws_run_rate.context: AWS now has an annualized revenue run rate of $132 billion.

advertising_revenue.context: Advertising services revenue grew 22% year-over-year to $17.7 billion.

rufus_usage.context: Rufus has had 250 million active customers this year.

initiatives: Project Rainier launched with nearly 500,000 Trainium2 chips.
AgentCore launched for secure, scalable agents.
Expanding perishable grocery same-day delivery to 2,300+ communities.
Partnerships with Netflix, Spotify, SiriusXM for DSP.
Plan to remove layers and increase ownership (severance charges incurred).

revenue.context: Net sales are expected to be between $206.0 billion and $213.0 billion.

operating_income.context: Operating income is expected to be between $21.0 billion and $26.0 billion.
